name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UK Visa Sponsorship Checker: Use AI to find a visa sponsored job

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check visa sponsorship, find employees to reach out to and check salary estimates for LinkedIn job listings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I've been sponsored twice in 3 years and understand how hard it is.

To help people like myself, I've built an AI Powered Visa Sponsorship Checker. Click on a listing on LinkedIn or Indeed and click "Check Sponsorship" and our AI will tell you whether a company sponsors and the registered name!

Now you can also check which employers are actively sponsoring visas, saving you HOURS every week!

The tool also gives you relevant employees for the role to increase your chances of getting a visa sponsored job.

To make sure the salary is above the minimum threshold, I've also added a salary estimate feature.

****************************
UPDATES: 
Sponsorship check now looks at specific role, not just employer
Ability to check sponsorship activity
Added Indeed Compatibility
Added Salary Estimate feature in popup
Added Find Employee feature
